hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Sa’eed that the Prophet (ﷺ) said:‘The one in Ihram may kill the snake, the scorpion, the aggressive predator, the vicious dog and the harmful mouse.” It was said to him: “Why is it said that they are harmful?” He said:* “Because the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) woke up because of one, and it had taken the wick (of the lamp) to burn down the house.”

chapter.eng-name: What may be killed in Ihram
